description: Kangaskhan`s name is a combination of the word kangaroo and the name of the famous ruler of the Mongol Empire, Genghis Khan. Its Japanese name is derived from "kangaroo" (カンガルー) and "ruler" (ルーラー). Unlike real kangaroos, Kangaskhan do not hop, though they do have pouches in which they carry their infants. Kangaskhan is a female-only Pokémon.
name: Garura
